divs: sighting detailsi am in telepathic contact with intelligent life, and on the night in question i was telepathed to "look up" [verbatim], and upon doing so, i witnessed the ufo. for more detailed information about my contact, please read the mufon webboards under "the black triangles" (pages 8 on), subheading under "ufo crafts\ships", subheading under "ufo talk". my handle with the mufon webboards is "smokeytbones", a handle the aliens gave me because i smoke, which they do not like.
